prompts: Based on the analysis, write fixes for the critical issues found

step_results: Found 3 issues: SQL injection in login.ts, XSS in profile.ts, missing CSRF token
Fixed SQL injection with parameterized queries. Fixed XSS with DOMPurify. Added CSRF middleware.
Wrote 12 tests covering all 3 fixes. All passing.
expected_final_stdout: Wrote 12 tests covering all 3 fixes. All passing.
